org.jgum

Class JGum

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgum.CategorizationContext
      • org.jgum.JGum

  • public class JGum
extends CategorizationContext
    Defines a register of categorizations that pre-includes a named categorization and a type categorization. It also provides high-level methods to ease the manipulation of these categorizations.
    Author:
    sergioc

      • forNameRoot

        public NamedCategory forNameRoot()
        Returns:
        the category corresponding to the root in the named categorization (the empty name).

      • forName

        public NamedCategory forName(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - the full name (e.g., "a.b.c") of a category.
        Returns:
        a category corresponding to the given name.

      • forPackage

        public NamedCategory forPackage(Package pakkage)
        Parameters:
        pakkage - the package object for which a category is requested.
        Returns:
        a name category corresponding to the name of the given Package object.

      • getTypeCategorization

        public TypeCategorization getTypeCategorization()

      • forTypeRoot

        public TypeCategoryRoot forTypeRoot()
        Returns:
